title: Staff Platform Architect
full_text: We are seeking a Staff Platform Architect to define technical strategy and architecture for our distributed systems platform. You will drive cross-team alignment, own the technology roadmap, and design cloud-native infrastructure patterns. This is a leadership role focused on architecture, not an individual contributor coding position. Requirements: 10+ years of software engineering experience, 5+ years in architecture or principal-level roles, deep experience with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), API design and governance, distributed systems patterns.
